name: @mashthekeys/console-buffer
description: Buffer calls to console.log, console.warn, etc. for deferred logging in NodeJS and web browsers.  Forked to provide ConsoleBuffer constructor independently of replacing the global console.

scripts.prepare: npm run test && npm run bundle
scripts.test: for f in tests/*; do echo "$f"; node "$f"; done; echo 'passed!'; exit 0

author: Andy Holland (https://github.com/mashthekeys)
